column1: Traffic reports will resume Tuesday December 27 at 4:00 p.m.

column4: W High St between S Upper St and S Mill St
column5: The roadway is shutdown until further notice due to a water main break.

column4: Use added caution this morning.  Slow down and increase following distances.

NWS statement:  "Patchy light freezings drizzle could create a few slick spots on area
roadways early this morning."
